channel.title: Help with player
channel.description:
People can't connect into my server. I think i need to portforward. And i read the HOW TO MAKE A SERVER in Tutorial.
But my router is a DL-604 : D-link 604.
And it's not the same router on the page. And they tell me to go at www.portforward.com. I found my routers but when i'm on the page after, there is a thing for games. Which i choose?
Well i need help about portforward with a DL-604.
Thanks.

item.title: Help with player
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

People can’t connect into my server.
I think i need to portforward. And i read the HOW TO MAKE A SERVER in Tutorial.

But my router is a DL-604 : D-link 604.

And it’s not the same router on the page. And they tell me to go at www.portforward.com. I found my routers but when i’m on the page after, there is a thing for games. Which i choose?

Well i need help about portforward with a DL-604.

Thanks.
